analysis.key_quote: This proposed change would not increase the integrity or effectiveness of the civil service hiring and retention. “Poor performers” would not be weeded out – any public servant deemed a threat to the President will be taken out.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the undermining of merit-based systems, and the erosion of due process protections for federal employees. It emphasizes the importance of integrity and nonpartisan service in the federal workforce.
